title: Centuries-Old Marginalia in Rare Books on Display at Library (The University of Tennessee at Knoxville) ...
text: ( Source : The University of Tennessee at Knoxville ) As long as there have been books, readers have been writing in the margins. An exhibit of rare books at Hodges Library contains examples of marginalia from over the centuries. The display
